title: RETA
body: The Refrigerating Engineers & Technicians Association (RETA), founded in 1910, is an international society of individuals and companies involved in the design, operation and service of industrial refrigeration systems.

title: Certification Overview - RETA
body: RETA certification requires meeting eligibility criteria and demonstrating knowledge of industrial refrigeration concepts, principles and practices. RETA certification exams and other requirements assess competencies in the realm of industrial refrigeration operation.

title: CARO Certification - RETA
body: Candidates may reschedule their exam by contacting RETA at least four business days before their scheduled test date. If you reschedule or cancel after the deadline a $150 late fee will be required before you can reschedule your exam.

title: Courses - RETA
body: This list of course offerings is provided as a service to our members, however RETA cannot enroll you for the classes. You will need to contact the school/business directly.

title: Online Training - RETA
body: Sign in to the online training Web Portal We have a separate web portal for online training. Click here to sign in to online training if you're already a subscriber. Your online training sign in credentials may be different than your RETA login.
